name: Beurer KS25 Digital Kitchen Scales
description:
Slow cooking in your Crock-Pot; 

Slow Cooker provides you the flexibility to prepare a meal early and then have it cook all day. 

You can carry out your full day's activities and still enjoy a nutritious, home-cooked meal in the evening. 

It's a healthier, more cost-efficient and convenient way to serve tasty, satisfying meals. 

This Crock-Pot; Manual Slow Cooker cooks on HIGH or LOW settings and the WARM setting can be used to keep your dish at an ideal serving temperature.

  • INTEGRATED WEIGHING BOWL: The large and practical weighing bowl is dishwasher safe and has a generous capacity of 1.2 litres.
  • PRECISE MEASUREMENTS: This digital kitchen scale has a 1g graduation for accurate weighing and measuring.
  • TARE FUNCTION: Weigh all your ingredients together in 1 bowl! Press the tare function after each ingredient is added to reset the digital scale to 0.
  • PRACTICAL: Measure in grams, kilograms, pounds or ounces. You can even weigh letters and parcels.
  • DIGITAL MEASUREMENT: The digital kitchen scale has a large digital backlit display, overload indicator and automatic switch-off function..Includes: 1x kitchen scale, 1x weighing bowl, 1x instructions for use, 2x 1.5v AAA batteries​

Product information

  • Beurer KS25 Digital Kitchen Scale - your digital assistant in the kitchen

    Whether cooking or baking, the Beurer KS25 kitchen scale is an ideal helper in the kitchen. With its elegant design and easy-to-read backlit digital display, it fits perfectly into any modern kitchen. The practical tare weighing function improves your efficiency in the kitchen as you can weigh several ingredients in succession and mix them directly into the included weighing bowl. With a weight capacity of 3kg, you can get incredibly accurate measurements and even weigh your letters and parcels for postage.

    Key features of the KS25 at a glance:

    - Includes practical dishwasher-safe weighing bowl with 1.2 litre capacity
    - High weight capacity 3 kg
    - 1g graduation
    - Adjustable weighing until between g, kg or lb:oz
    - Practical tare weighing function
    - Automatic switch-off and overload display
    - Battery operated: 2x 1.5v AAA batteries (included)
    - Dimensions: 22cm x 15cm x 5cm
    - Display dimensions: 6.5cm x 2.8cm

name: Beats solo3 wireless headphones
description:
Beats Solo3 Wireless Headphones - Club White MV8V2PA/A

With up to 40 hours of battery life, the Beats Solo3 Wireless are your perfect everyday headphones. With Fast Fuel, a 5-minute charge gives you 3 hours of playback. Enjoy award-winning Beats sound with Class 1 Bluetooth wireless freedom. On-ear, padded ear cups are adjustable so you can customize your fit for all-day comfort.

 

Features of Beats Solo3 Wireless Headphones – Club White MV8V2PA/A

Combining the efficient W1 chip provides seamless setup and switching for your Apple devices, up to 40 hours of battery life, and Fast Fuel technology for 3 hours of playtime with a 5-minute charge.

Beats Solo3 Wireless headphones  are ready to go when you want them to. They instantly set up - just turn on and hold near your iPhone - then connect to Apple Watch, iPad, and Mac simultaneously. The Apple W1 chip features Class 1 Bluetooth connectivity, which is industry-leading in strength and signal strength. With best-in-class pairing technology, you can seamlessly sync with your devices so you can easily move and keep your music going.

At the heart of the Beats Solo3 Wireless is the award-winning Beats sound. These headphones offer premium playback with audio fine-tuned to maximize clarity, breadth, and balance. Comfortable cushioned headphones cushion outside noises for sound to come out, so you can experience your music the way it was meant to be heard.

 

Beats Solo3 wireless headphones  offer up to 40 hours of battery life thanks to the efficiency of the Apple W1 chip. Or, with Fast Fuel, a quick 5-minute charge provides 3 hours of playback to quickly get you back on track. Built-in on-ear controls combined with dual beamforming microphones let you take calls, play music, adjust volume, and activate Siri on the go.

Beats Solo3 Wireless stay true to their predecessors with bold styling and streamlined design. The on-ear, padded ear cups are adjustable, so you can customize your fit for all-day listening comfort. The headphones' fast-flowing curves and rotating earcups complete this natural fit, designed for optimal comfort and sound.

Connect via Bluetooth Class 1 to your device for wireless listening

The award-winning sound and design you love from Beats

Up to 40 hours of battery life for days of use

With Fast Fuel, 5 minutes of charging gives you 3 hours of playback when the battery is low

Adjustable fit with comfortable padded ear cups for everyday use

Sleek, streamlined, durable, and foldable design to go wherever you go

Take calls, control your music, and activate Siri with the multi-function control buttons
